entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as 'he' and 'Harry'. The text describes him as being part of a plan with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who is also part of the plan. He suggests that Hermione pretend to be waiting for Professor Flitwick.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's and Ron's, who is tasked with watching out for Snape. She agrees to do this despite initially being hesitant.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A staff member at the school, who Hermione is tasked with keeping an eye on.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: A staff member at the school, who Ron suggests that Hermione pretend to be waiting for.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A staff member at the school, who appears and scolds Harry, Ron, and Hermione for their plan.

entities.name: fluffy
entities.description: A three-headed dog that is being kept in a separate area of the school.

entities.name: the staff room
entities.description: A location where Snape is waiting, and Hermione is tasked with keeping an eye on him.

entities.name: the third-floor corridor
entities.description: A location that Harry and Ron are trying to reach, but are thwarted by Professor McGonagall.
